tool_description:
Actionable insights based on Factset and Morningstar Data. 
Differentiating content for digital brokerage and investment advisors. 
Quantitative stock analysis and research.
name: theScreener Stock insights
title: theScreener Stock insights

api_list.name: /api/Stock/GetChecklist
api_list.description:
Checklist summarizes key securtity evaluations comparing them to industry standard, that includes:
- theScreener's Rating (Global Evaluation)
- Star Rating
- Sensitivity Analysis
- Target Prices  

Usage: 
Integrate theScreener Checklist into your applications and plaforms to quickly assess and compare stock evaluations against industry standards or other stocks. This data helps the decision-making process. 

Sample request to get Airbus checklist in French:
    POST api/stock/GetStockFavicon
    {        
      "pIsin": "NL0000235190",
      "pCcy": "EUR",
      "pCountry": "FR",
      "pLang": "fr"
    }

required_parameters.name: pLang
required_parameters.description:
Available languages:
   - en: English
   - fr: French
   -de: German
   -it: Italian
   -es: Spanish
   -nl: Dutch

api_list.name: /api/Stock/GetStocksList
api_list.description: Stocks list followed by theScreener with a flag indicating if the report is available.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thescreener-stock-insights.p.rapidapi.com/api/Stock/GetStocksList"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thescreener-stock-insights.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://thescreener-stock-insights.p.rapidapi.com/api/Stock/GetStocksList"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thescreener-stock-insights.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/Stock/GetReport
api_list.description:
A comprehensive document that harnesses the full spectrum of theScreener's analytical capabilities, providing a comprehensive and detailed overview. 

How to use: 
Integrate theScreener Reports into your platforms to access comprehensive reports on a wide range of financial entities. These reports provide valuable information for decision-making, portfolio management and market analysis. 

Reports can be customized (colors, logo, disclaimer, single page, unrated). Index, market, industry and fund reports are also available. Please do not hesitate to contact us.

Sample request to get Airbus PDF report in French:
    POST api/stock/GetStockFavicon
    {        
      "pIsin": "NL0000235190",
      "pCcy": "EUR",
      "pCountry": "FR",
      "pLang": "fr"
    }

required_parameters.name: pLang
required_parameters.description:
Available languages:
   - en: English
   - fr: French
   -de: German
   -it: Italian
   -es: Spanish
   -nl: Dutch

api_list.name: /api/Stock/GetStockDescription
api_list.description:
This API is a comprehensive tool that provides extensive and detailed descriptions of companies. It is designed to provide an overview of a company's history, products, services, mission, vision and more. Users can access rich text descriptions to better understand the companies they are interested in.

Available in several languages. 

Usage: 
Integrate this API into your applications to enheance the user experience.
 
Sample request to get company description for Airbus in french:
    POST api/stock/GetStockDescription
    {        
      "pIsin": "NL0000235190",
      "pLang": "fr"  
    }

api_list.name: /api/Stock/GetKeyPoints
api_list.description:
theScreener keyPoints extract the most relevant facts out of the data maze into ready-to-use insight. theScreener keyPoints consider, among others, the following aspects: 
- Financials  
- Performance
- Industry and Market Context
- Analysts Expectations
- Sensitivity 

Usage: 
Integrate theScreener keyPoints into your applications to gain valuable insights and fact on our data and boost the innovation of your systems. This data helps the decision validation for trading clients.

Sample request to get Airbus Key points in French:
    POST api/stock/GetStockFavicon
    {        
      "pIsin": "NL0000235190",
      "pCcy": "EUR",
      "pCountry": "FR",
      "pLang": "fr"
    }

required_parameters.name: pLang
required_parameters.description:
Available languages:
   - en: English
